title: Alpha-9 "Last Hope

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Copy the abilities and attributes of a kill capable SCP that does *not* exist, alive or dead.
- Can only spawn when the Foundation outnumbers the largest REF by two or less members, or if the Foundation itself is outnumbered.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Recontain all anomalies and eliminate all opposing forces.

desc:
Post 4801
*The reborn Omega-7. A Mobile Task Force explicitly intended to train and utilize humanoid SCP objects in the field.*
